name: Greater Feint
text: You are skilled at making foes overreact to your attacks.
prerequisites: Combat Expertise, Improved Feint, base attack bonus +6, Int 13.
benefit: Whenever you use feint to cause an opponent to lose his Dexterity bonus, he loses that bonus until the beginning of your next turn, in addition to losing his Dexterity bonus against your next attack.
normal: A creature you feint loses its Dexterity bonus against your next attack.
staminaText: You can select this feat even if you don’t meet the ability score prerequisite (Intelligence 13). You gain the benefits of this feat only as long as you have at least 1 stamina point in your stamina pool. If you have at least 1 point in your stamina pool, you can feint as a swift action, but the feint causes the opponent to become flat-footed only for your next attack rather than for all attacks until the beginning of your next turn.
text_zh: 你擅长令敌人对你的攻击反应过度。
prerequisites_zh: 寓守于攻，精通虚招，BAB+6，智力13。
benefit_zh: 当你对敌人使用虚招令其失去AC的敏捷加值时，他直到下轮你的行动开始时都失去该加值，而不是原本的仅持续到你的下一次攻击。
normal_zh: 被你的虚招误导的生物失去AC的敏捷加值，直到你的下一次攻击。
staminaText_zh: 在你并不满足这个专长的属性先决条件（智力13）时你也能选择这个专长。只有当你在耐力池中拥有1点耐力时你才能获得这个专长的好处。如果你的耐力池还有至少1点耐力，你可以以一个迅捷动作进行虚招，但这个虚招只能让敌人对你的下一次攻击陷入措手不及，而不是到你的下一轮开始的所有攻击。
